ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 101
ygData.msgSnippet: I´ve posted this on the info page about Kelethin on Everlore already, but it´s probably a good idea to post it here too. One day as I was omw to the rogue
ygData.messageBody:
I�ve posted this on the info page about Kelethin on
Everlore already, but it�s probably a good idea to
post it here too.
One day as I was omw to the rogue guild in Kelethin I
went in to one of the shops on the way to sell. In
there was a huge gnome, the size of a woodelf, which
I�ve never seen or heard about before. His name was
some typical gnome name, with a four letter first
name, and Fiddlebiddle or something as his surname.
When I hailed him he said something like: "Don�t you
find the girls in Kelethin sweet as their wine?" I
tried to ask him different things, but he didn�t
react. I also tried to give him elven wine, but he
only said "thank you". I can�t remember what he
conned, but I wouldn�t have killed him anyway,
probably bad faction.
Does anyone have any experience or information about
this guy? Could he be tinkering related? This happened
after the last patch.

Also, concerning the gnome spelunker in Unrest: You
say he KOS everyone, but has any necro tried to go
near him? If there are any high level necro�s on this
list, would they be interested in trying to get in
touch with him?

Also, about gathering tinkering info: Wouldn�t it be a
good idea to gather all info we found about all the
NPC gnomes in Norrath on a web-page? What all gnome
merchants sold, what quests they are related too and
so on? What factions do you get if you kill them, who
do they KOS and not?
Anyone interested in doing this?

Piip Ignatz
rogue of the 24th grade
Innoruuk server
